alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 3:42AM CDT until March 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Burr Oak Creek near Perkins affecting Sioux County. .Burr Oak Creek near Perkins has risen to minor flood stage likely due to snow melt and a potential ice jam. Levels are expected to fall through Wednesday. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Burr Oak Creek near Perkins. * WHEN...From early this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, flooding of lower lying crop and pasture land begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Burr Oak Creek Perkins 16.0 17.0 Wed 3 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM CDT.
